attributes.action: stop positive discrimination being made legal by an act of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By allowing discrimination against white workers especially men the government will act against the race relation act 1976. This will undo the very point of equality that the act sought to ensure. It will also mean people can miss out on jobs and won't be judged on merit alone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
